short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Force start cloud-hosted machine on lcs.dynamics.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of waiting for LCS to refresh (manual stop ~3min, manual start ~3min) the status of a cloud-hosted machine? Force start a cloud-hosted machine on LCS (lcs.dynamics.com) with this plugin. A new start button will be shown on the cloud-hosted environment site next to the stop button. Note: A cloud-hosted machine that is already running is not affected by subsequent force starts triggered by this plugin.
